name: Schumacher Farm
body: ### Welcome to SchumacherFarm.com Schumacher Farm is a small piece of land in between Andover and Ludlow, Vermont. We raise chickens and eggs, and are available for rent for weddings and other events. ### Contact Us For now, contact us on Twitter, you can Follow @schumacherfarm
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
